title: Warm by Sergio Rebolledo
author: Sergio Rebolledo
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Warm by Sergio Rebolledo
text:
Issue 40 – January 2010
 Cover Art
 by Sergio Rebolledo
 2011 Finalist: Chesley Award for Best Magazine Cover
 Sergio Rebolledo is a 22-year-old graphic design student from Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. He studies at the University of Guadalaja and looks forward to becoming a professional creative director.
